proposal: Understanding the power of decentralized computing, OpClouds is reshaping the DePIN landscape with its innovative CRaaS, offering GPU/VM rentals, cloud mining, and an AI Train-to-Earn model. With 19 holders in the ETH network, you're on a promising path. Imagine enhancing your community's engagement and revenue with our DEX and Lottery tools, where anyone can deploy and benefit. Let's power up the decentralized world together, one block at a time.
